title: U.S. consumers ' purchase frequency of cosmetic products 2014
summary: The U.S. consumers Response in the purchase frequency was Response Hair_styling_products , who made 87 respondents .
The most consumers Response was Cosmetics_(e.g._bronzer_foundation_lip_gloss) , with just 8 respondents .

In second place was Response Facial/skin_care_products_(e.g._moisturizers_primers_specialty_cleansers) with 48 respondents ; third place went to Response Shampoos_and/or_conditioners with 87 respondents ; fourth place went to Response None_of_these with 8 respondents and fifth place went to Response Sunscreen , who was 41 respondents .

data.Response: Facial/skin care products (e.g. moisturizers primers specialty cleansers)
Non-sunscreen products with SPF protection (e.g. lotions lip balm)

gold: This statistic presents the results of a survey among U.S. adult consumers . The survey was fielded online by Harris Interactive in June 2014 , asking the respondents which cosmetic products they purchase and regularly use . Some 42 percent of U.S. adults indicated that they purchase and use hair styling products on a regular basis .
